# Darwhin Gomez

**Email:** Darwhin88@gmail.com

---

## Professional Summary  
Solutions-focused technologist with extensive experience in software engineering and team management, specializing in building scalable infrastructure and innovative applications. Proven track record in leading cross-functional teams to deliver high-impact projects while maintaining a hands-on coding approach in Python and Java. Adept at defining strategic roadmaps and driving organizational initiatives to enhance operational efficiency and product quality. Committed to leveraging advanced technologies to shape the future of social connectivity at Meta.

---
